locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Kids Fruit Puzzle
locale.subtitle: Fruit jigsaw Park
locale.description: Come and join us in the wonderful fruit jigsaw tour and get to know all kinds of fruit together. There are delicious apples, bananas, peaches and so on. There are all kinds of fruits you want to eat. Do not miss them. The fruit includes berries: strawberry, blueberry, blackberry, mulberry, raspberry, grape, green, red, crystal, and horse milk citrus: sugar orange, citrus, orange, orange, citrus, grapefruit, grapefruit, grapefruit, lemon, and the new year's new year nuclear fruit: peach, plum, cherry, apricot, apricot, plum, and bayberry, West plum, plum, jujube, jujube, jujube, jujube, jujube, olive, litchi, longan, longan (Gui Yuan), areca benevolence, apple, pear, snake fruit, apple, fruit, fruit, persimmon, mangosteen, black brunle, loquat, carambola, hawthorn, Cherry Tomatoes, fig, Rohan, Pitaya, kiwi fruit Melon, melon, melon, cantaloupe, papaya, papaya, papaya and other: pineapple, mango, chestnut, coconut, kiwi fruit, guava, durian, banana, sugar cane, lotus seed, pomegranate, walnut
locale.promotional_text: Let the child know all kinds of fruit

keywords.keyword: 海滨消消乐元素,消,假日,缤果,宾果,小怪兽,割绳子玩棋牌,找你妹2014,打方块爱消除大作战,物大战僵尸,欢乐球吃,开心,一通,超级玛丽1,最囧游戏大全,果汁四溅2,苹果,梦幻花园,鳄鱼洗澡免费

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 儿童水果拼图
locale.subtitle: 水果拼图乐园
locale.description: 快来和我们一起开始奇妙的水果拼图之旅，一起认识各种各样的水果吧！ 这里有美味可口的苹果、香蕉、桃子等，你想吃的水果都有，应有尽有，千万不要错过呦！涵盖的水果有： 浆果类：草莓，蓝莓，黑莓，桑葚，覆盆子，葡萄，青提，红提，水晶葡萄， 马奶子 柑橘类：砂糖橘，金橘，甜橙，脐橙，西柚，柚子，葡萄柚， 柠檬，文旦 核果类：桃子，李子，樱桃，杏，梅子，杨梅， 西梅，乌梅，红枣，海枣，蜜枣，橄榄，荔枝，龙眼（桂圆），槟榔 仁果类：苹果 ，梨 ，蛇果，海棠果，沙果，柿子，山竹，黑布林， 枇杷，杨桃，山楂，圣女果，无花果，白果，罗汉果，火龙果，猕猴桃 瓜类：西瓜，甜瓜，香瓜，哈密瓜，木瓜，乳瓜 其他：菠萝，芒果，板栗，椰子，奇异果，芭乐，榴莲，香蕉，甘蔗， 莲子，石榴，核桃

keywords.keyword: 蔬菜游戏,记忆彩,儿童绘画神器,和聚会,水果拼盘,集中注意力100,提高记忆力训练,宝贝,孩子画画教学,惠花,汇,色卡,宝宝爱刷牙,色彩大师,教程,图画本,软件,沙拉,有机,小吉,家,宫殿,日,画面
